page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Class J3G at Lower Park School and Junior 4 at Poynton Worth School were each allocated half of a 12km grid, covering approximately 2/3 of the residentialarea of Poynton and Countryside to the east and south of it. The area has been surveyed as follows: Home Life in Poynton; Farming in Higher Poynton; Shafts and Quarries near Poynton; Roads and Footpaths around Poynton; Tourism in Higher Poynton; Macclesfield Canal; Ecology in Higher Poynton; People and Employment in Poynton; Recreation in Poynton; Poynton Parish Council; Working Farms near Poynton; Traffic in Poynton; Schools in Poynton; Poynton Council of Chuches; Poynton in the Future.
